statements: UPDATE car_regulatory_requirements SET manufacturer='Toyota', model='Corolla', manufacturing_year=2020, safety_rating=4.5, emissions_compliance=true WHERE car_id=1;
UPDATE car_regulatory_requirements SET safety_rating=5, emissions_compliance=false, manufacturer='Ford', manufacturing_year=2018, model='Mustang' WHERE car_id=3;
UPDATE car_regulatory_requirements SET safety_rating = 4.5, emissions_compliance = TRUE WHERE car_id = 123
UPDATE car_regulatory_requirements SET model = 'SUV', manufacturing_year = 2022, emissions_compliance = FALSE WHERE car_id = 456
UPDATE car_regulations SET brand='Toyota', model='Camry', manufacturing_year=2020, safety_rating=5, emissions_standard='EPA' WHERE car_id=1;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_status='Compliant', last_inspection='2021-10-15' WHERE compliance_id=2;
UPDATE car_regulations SET brand = 'Toyota', model = 'Corolla', manufacturing_year = 2020 WHERE car_id = 1;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance SET compliance_status = 'Compliant', last_inspection = '2022-10-15' WHERE car_id = 1;
UPDATE regulatory_requirements SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE car_safety SET car_id = 3 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE regulatory_requirements SET description = 'New Description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE car_safety SET safety_standard = 'ISO 9001' WHERE car_id = 100;
UPDATE regulatory_requirements SET description = 'Revised description' WHERE requirement_id = 1;
UPDATE car_models SET manufacturer = 'Toyota' WHERE model_id = 2;
UPDATE regulatory_requirements SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE requirement_id = 1;
UPDATE safety_standards SET description = 'Updated standard description', standard_name = 'New Standard Name' WHERE standard_id = 2;
UPDATE car_models SET manufacturer_name='Toyota', emission_standard='EURO 6' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE car_inspection SET inspector_name='John Doe', result='Pass' WHERE car_id=123;
UPDATE car_models SET manufacturer_name='Ford', production_year=2022 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE car_inspection SET result='Passed', inspector_name='John Doe' WHERE car_id=5;
